title: It’s on Zeit 3/11: 3/11 Day, Hand Sanitizers, Harvard (again), E3
itunes:title: It’s on Zeit 3/11: 3/11 Day, Hand Sanitizers, Harvard (again), E3
description:
On this edition of It’s on Zeit Miles, Laci, and DJ Danl discuss 3/11 Day and all its associations, people are over-using or buying the wrong kind of hand sanitizer, the Harvard story was fake, and E3 is getting cancelled. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
